languages.text: "Кажется, богохульная тварь может чувствовать боль и бояться... Это славно". {n}Рыжеволосый расплывается в улыбке одновременно радостной и кровожадной.{/n}
"It seems the blasphemous creature can feel pain and fear... That is glorious." {n}Ulfar's face breaks into a smile that is both joyous and bloodthirsty.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кажется, богохульная тварь может чувствовать боль и бояться... Это славно". {n}Рыжеволосый расплывается в улыбке одновременно радостной и кровожадной.{/n}

languages.text: 「この不敬な化け物は痛みや恐れを感じられるようだな…。こいつは名声を得られるぞ」{n}ウルファーの顔に、喜びと残虐さが同居した笑みが突然浮かぶ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It seems the blasphemous creature can feel pain and fear... That is glorious." {n}Ulfar's face breaks into a smile that is both joyous and bloodthirsty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この不敬な化け物は痛みや恐れを感じられるようだな…。こいつは名声を得られるぞ」{n}ウルファーの顔に、喜びと残虐さが同居した笑みが突然浮かぶ。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “看来，这只亵渎的生物依然能品尝到痛苦与恐惧的滋味……真是太棒了。”{n}乌尔法露出喜悦而嗜血的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It seems the blasphemous creature can feel pain and fear... That is glorious." {n}Ulfar's face breaks into a smile that is both joyous and bloodthirsty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “看来，这只亵渎的生物依然能品尝到痛苦与恐惧的滋味……真是太棒了。”{n}乌尔法露出喜悦而嗜血的笑容。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Il semble que la créature blasphématoire puisse ressente la douleur et la peur... Quelle excellente nouvelle ! » {n}Le visage d'Ulfar se fend d'un sourire à la fois joyeux et carnassier.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It seems the blasphemous creature can feel pain and fear... That is glorious." {n}Ulfar's face breaks into a smile that is both joyous and bloodthirsty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il semble que la créature blasphématoire puisse ressente la douleur et la peur... Quelle excellente nouvelle ! » {n}Le visage d'Ulfar se fend d'un sourire à la fois joyeux et carnassier.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Parece que la criatura impía es capaz de sentir dolor y miedo... Qué maravilla». {n}La expresión de Ulfar se quiebra en una sonrisa alegre y a la vez sanguinaria.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It seems the blasphemous creature can feel pain and fear... That is glorious." {n}Ulfar's face breaks into a smile that is both joyous and bloodthirsty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Parece que la criatura impía es capaz de sentir dolor y miedo... Qué maravilla». {n}La expresión de Ulfar se quiebra en una sonrisa alegre y a la vez sanguinaria.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Diese blasphemische Kreatur scheint Schmerz und Furcht zu verspüren ... Das ist ruhmreich." {n}Ulfar verzieht sein Gesicht zu einem gleichsam fröhlichen wie blutrünstigen Lächeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It seems the blasphemous creature can feel pain and fear... That is glorious." {n}Ulfar's face breaks into a smile that is both joyous and bloodthirsty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese blasphemische Kreatur scheint Schmerz und Furcht zu verspüren ... Das ist ruhmreich." {n}Ulfar verzieht sein Gesicht zu einem gleichsam fröhlichen wie blutrünstigen Lächeln.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Bu günahkâr yaratık, acı ve korku hissedebiliyor gibi duruyor. Muhteşem." {n}Ulfar'ın yüzünde hem neşeli hem de kana susamış bir gülümseme peyda oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It seems the blasphemous creature can feel pain and fear... That is glorious." {n}Ulfar's face breaks into a smile that is both joyous and bloodthirsty.{/n}
